title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu (Baka & Test - Summon the Beasts)
synopsis: Fumizuki Academy isn't a typical Japanese high school. This unique institution has implemented a new and innovative system to sort its students. At the end of their freshman year, students take a test that divides up the student body. The highest scorers are placed into A class, all the way down until F class, for the lowest of the low.
